name: Mountain Bike
description: The classic bike rental option. It's our simplest and most familiar option. Recommended for all levels of cyclist.

name: Commuter
description: Planning to go slightly further? Our folding bike is ideal to take on public transport.

name: E-Bike
description: The latest addition to our fleet. It's like a regular bike but with a battery and a burst of pace when you need it!

name: Sprinter
description: Our lightest carbon fibre road bike ever. Use this if you want to get places really quickly!

name: My first bike
description: The perfect bike for your youngest family members so that everyone can join in on your ride.

name: More bikes!
description: More bikes will be coming soon!
